name: uptime-kuma
tagline: A self-hosted uptime monitoring and status page tool
description: Uptime Kuma is a self-hosted monitoring and status page solution. It supports HTTP, ping, DNS, and more checks, sending notifications and rendering a beautiful status page for your services.

features.title: Multi-Protocol Monitoring
features.description: Monitor HTTP, HTTPS, TCP, ping, DNS, and more with flexible check types

features.title: Status Pages
features.description: Create beautiful public or private status pages to communicate service health to users

features.title: 90+ Notification Channels
features.description: Send alerts via email, Slack, Discord, webhooks, and many more notification services

features.title: Performance Tracking
features.description: Track and visualize response times with charts showing performance trends

features.title: Certificate Monitoring
features.description: Monitor SSL certificate expiration and receive alerts before certificates expire

features.title: Uptime Statistics
features.description: View uptime percentages and availability statistics for all monitored services

features.title: Maintenance Windows
features.description: Schedule maintenance windows to pause alerts during planned downtime

features.title: Multi-User Support
features.description: Support multiple users with individual accounts and notification preferences
